description: Personal CRM. Remember everything about your friends, family and business relationships.

SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

Dolibarr ERP CRM is a modern software package to manage your company or foundation activity (contacts, suppliers, invoices, orders, stocks, agenda, accounting, ...).It's opensource software (wrote with PHP language) designed for small and medium companies, foundation and freelances.
